description: AMAR: Archive of Mesopotamian Archaeological Site Reports The defaul t view of digitized books in AMAR is page view.  However, by choosing the Complete Print Version from the View drop - down screen located in the upper left hand corner of the individual item screen , a complete print version is generated in PDF format .
